channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Urevo SpaceWalk 5L Walking Pad Review: Compact and Affordable
item.description: Urevo’s affordable new walking pad is cheaper than a round-trip ticket to hike in Iceland.

item.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
item.description: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.

item.title: Microsoft announces glut of new data centers but says it won’t let your electricity bill go up
item.description: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.

item.title: Deepgram raises $130M at $1.3B valuation and buys a YC AI startup
item.description: Deepgram is raising its Series C round at a $1.3 billion valuation.

item.title: Man to plead guilty to hacking US Supreme Court filing system
item.description: A 24-year-old from Tennessee is expected to admit to accessing the Supreme Court’s electronic filing system without authorization dozens of times thro...

item.title: A consumer watchdog issued a warning about Google’s AI agent shopping protocol — Google says she’s wrong
item.description: A consumer economics watchdog says Google's new Universal Commerce Protocol is ripe for misuse where consumers could pay more for items. Google denies...

item.title: Ammobia says it has reinvented a century-old technology
item.description: The startup has a new take on the Haber-Bosch process used to make ammonia. If Ammobia can deliver, it could change industries, from power generation ...

item.title: Microsoft Has a Plan to Keep Its Data Centers From Raising Your Electric Bill
item.description: In response to a growing backlash, Microsoft said it would take steps to ensure that data centers don't raise utility bills in surrounding areas and a...

item.title: Ring founder details the camera company’s ‘intelligent assistant’ era
item.description: AI is ushering in Ring’s next chapter, as the Amazon-owned video doorbell maker shifts toward becoming an “intelligent assistant.”

item.title: Slackbot is an AI agent now
item.description: Salesforce unveils Slackbot, a new AI agent that allows users to complete tasks across multiple enterprise applications from Slack.
